"A.P.239/5/10/10:30": "...Just as the rumors said, a Corrupted Area. It's been settled like outrageously."

"It's terrible to see a Corrupted Area on such a familiar planet.
...Don't you think?"
"I don't know about that. I'm not a Dark Falz, after all."
"...Yucreta. How did you become [Apprentice]?"
"...How would I know?"
"Yucreta got caught up in it. Unlike you who became Dark Falz, don't mention her."
"From myself... That's right, I wished to become Dark Falz myself."
"It's quite an old tale."
"The tale of the most beautiful woman. That's all it took me to get there. My story..."
"My cuteness, my beauty... Personality, experience, I had it all. Not willing to lose to anyone."
"When everything fell rapidly... I remained at the top."
"But, more hands tried to reach me from below. Dragging me, trying to pull me down. Hands filled with greed."
"It isn't just the inevitable hands. My rebellion on the sense of the world. It's \"Tired\" and \"Old\"."
"Vicissitude. Such a way the world flows. I understand that, but, even so... I didn't want to fall from the stage."
"Instead of cloning and flesh... Should you keep the youth?"
"No, then I won't be myself! I did my best to be myself!"
"That's why I... If I'm not myself, then there's no meaning!"
"It became a major project. Xion's copy generation and failure. The end occurrence of [Profound Darkness]."
"Tumultuous time. But, even so, to me it was a great thing."
"The world I fought in was different. The swirling lies, deception, cytosine... The beautiful and terrible world."
"More beauty than anyone. More charm than anyone. Younger than anyone!"
"I wished just that... It should've been that."
"1. That was your desire?"
"2. And the result was this generation."
"...I don't really remember."
"...I know. You didn't need to say it, I know."
"But, it's not only my fault. Other than me, more Dark Falz were born, they also went on a rampage!"
"But we, as [Apprentice]... what's done can't be undone."
"The erosion of many stars... The resurrection of [Profound Darkness]..."
"...We have to take responsibility. Both you... and me."
"Yucreta..."
"I'm worried about this, let's go."
